competitions.title: CFA Institute Research Challenge
competitions.description: Annual global competition where teams analyze a publicly traded company and present their investment recommendation to a panel of industry professionals.
competitions.requirements: CFA Level 1 knowledge, financial modeling skills

competitions.title: Quantitative Trading Competition
competitions.description: Algorithmic trading competition where teams develop and backtest quantitative strategies using real market data and compete for the highest risk-adjusted returns.
competitions.requirements: Programming skills, statistical analysis, market knowledge

competitions.title: FinTech Innovation Challenge
competitions.description: Innovation-focused competition challenging teams to develop novel financial technology solutions addressing real-world market inefficiencies.
competitions.requirements: FinTech knowledge, innovation mindset, technical skills
